variants.disease_mechanism: LRRK2 kinase activity is dysregulated in PD, with this variant showing increased kinase activity in dopaminergic neuronal lines.
variants.assay_type: Kinase activity measurement in dopaminergic neuronal lines
variants.controls_replicates: Patients and controls used as controls; no explicit mention of variant-specific controls or replicates in the assay.
variants.variant_controls: No known pathogenic/benign controls used for this variant in the assay.
variants.statistical_analysis: Relative risk (RR) of 1.9 for combined variants, but no OddsPath calculation for individual variants.
variants.odds_path: No direct OddsPath value provided; statistical analysis insufficient.
